org.afree.chart.block
Class BlockBorder

java.lang.Object
  org.afree.chart.block.BlockBorder
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, BlockFrame
public class BlockBorder
extends java.lang.Object
implements BlockFrame, java.io.Serializable

A border for a block. This class is immutable.

See Also:
